title: Bengals breakdown with Dave Lapham
text:

Updated: Wed, Oct 14 2015, 10:47 PM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- Brad Steinke and Dave Lapham breakdown Bengals-Bills matchup. Related Stories Business News 
Car-buying fuels bump in September retail sales 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- Americans increased their spending at auto dealers, restaurants and clothiers in September, but cheaper gasoline prices suppressed overall retail sales growth. Science/Tech News
